title: Shining Fatherland

tokens.lyric: Sunlight beaming forth in the East, from the Fatherland;

lines.raw: [Bm]Sunlight beaming forth in the East, from the Fatherland;

tokens.lyric: Bringing tidings of a new world to families in the field.

lines.raw: [Em]Bringing tidings of a new world to families in the field.

tokens.lyric: Let us hasten to send the news all throughout the world,

lines.raw: [Bm]Let us hasten to send the news all throughout the world,

tokens.lyric: Eden's glory spreading forever the hope of joy and peace.

lines.raw: [G]Eden's glory spreading forever the hope of joy and peace.

tokens.lyric: Dawn, golden dawn, throughout the shining Fatherland,

lines.raw: [D]Dawn, golden dawn, throughout the shining Fatherland,

tokens.lyric: Tells the tidings of the rising sun that brings us life.

lines.raw: [Em]Tells the tidings of the rising sun that brings us life.

tokens.lyric: Harvest quickly men of the fields, hasten to harvest now;

lines.raw: [D]Harvest quickly men of the fields, hasten to harvest now;

tokens.lyric: Crops are ripened and ready to bring into the heavenly barn.

lines.raw: [G]Crops are ripened and ready to bring into the heavenly barn.

tokens.lyric: Saints and angels and heavenly hosts gather to speed the task;

lines.raw: [A]Saints and angels and heavenly hosts gather to speed the task;

tokens.lyric: All will share the harvest of joy at the banquet of our Lord.

lines.raw: [Bm]All will share the harvest of joy at the banquet of our Lord.

tokens.lyric: When the woes of six thousand years are gone from the Father's heart,

lines.raw: [Em]When the woes of six thousand years are gone from the Father's heart,

tokens.lyric: Sons and daughters shall live with great joy, our True Parents' own

lines.raw: [D]Sons and daughters shall live with great joy, our True Parents' own

tokens.lyric: Saints and sages and men of good faith all waited for this day;

lines.raw: [G]Saints and sages and men of good faith all waited for this day;

tokens.lyric: Loyal men of hope and fidelity yearned to see this day.

lines.raw: [A]Loyal men of hope and fidelity yearned to see this day.
